compatibility.notes: RPL-1.5 is a strong copyleft license, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under RPL-1.5 or a compatible license. This applies to both static and dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Must share all modifications and derivatives with the community upon deployment.
Must provide the same license terms for any distributed modifications or derivatives.
Must disclose source code when deploying the software internally or externally.
license.name: RPL-1.5
obligations: Disclose source code of modifications and derivatives when deploying the software.
Include a copy of the license with any distributed software.
Include copyright notices for original authors.
State changes made to the original software.
Disclose source code for any components used in conjunction with the licensed software.
